trans-unit.source: Provides a startup screen for a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式啟動螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Use the SplashScreen class to show an image in a startup window, or *splash screen*, when a WPF application starts.
trans-unit.target: 若要在啟動視窗中，顯示映像使用啟動顯示畫面類別或*啟動顯示畫面*、 WPF 應用程式啟動時。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A> method to display the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>方法，以顯示啟動顯示畫面。</xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method to close the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法，關閉啟動顯示畫面。</xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specify the image to use in the SplashScreen constructor.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在啟動顯示畫面的建構函式中使用映像。

trans-unit.source: The SplashScreen class can display any image format that is supported by the Windows Imaging Component (WIC).
trans-unit.target: 啟動顯示畫面類別可以顯示支援 Windows 影像處理元件 (WIC) 任何影像格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, or TIFF format.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 BMP、 GIF、 JPEG、 PNG 或 TIFF 格式。

trans-unit.source: If the image is a PNG file and it includes an alpha channel, the image is rendered using the transparency defined in the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像是 PNG 檔案，而且它會包含 alpha 色板，影像會轉譯使用 alpha 色板中定義的透明度。

trans-unit.source: You cannot include placeholder text in the splash screen that is later added by your code.
trans-unit.target: 您不能包含預留位置文字中要於稍後加入您的程式碼啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: If you want to include text in the splash screen, you must add it to the image file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要在啟動顯示畫面中包含文字，您必須將它加入至映像檔案。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not necessary to write any code to display a splash screen.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 則不需要撰寫任何程式碼，以顯示啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: Starting in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/add/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)] SP1, you can quickly configure a splash screen with default settings.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/add/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]SP1，您可以快速設定啟動顯示畫面以預設設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add a Splash Screen to a WPF Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to: WPF 應用程式中加入啟動顯示畫面](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The SplashScreen class displays the splash screen as soon as possible after the application is started.
trans-unit.target: 啟動顯示畫面類別會在應用程式啟動之後儘速顯示啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: The splash screen is displayed by using native code, before the WPF application instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立 WPF 應用程式執行個體之前，請使用原生程式碼，會顯示啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: The splash screen is displayed in the center of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 啟動顯示畫面會顯示在螢幕中央。

trans-unit.source: When the application is loaded, the splash screen fades.
trans-unit.target: 載入應用程式時，啟動顯示畫面會淡入。

trans-unit.source: When your application is compiled, the image is embedded as a managed resource in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 當您的應用程式編譯時，影像內嵌為受管理的資源組件中。

trans-unit.source: If the application is localized, the image is embedded in the localized satellite DLL.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式當地語系化時，影像會內嵌在當地語系化的附屬 DLL。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SplashScreen class is not available in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 啟動顯示畫面類別不是在部分信任中可用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SplashScreen class cannot be used in XAML Browser Applications (XBAPs), because they use a different startup architecture.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 啟動顯示畫面類別不能在 XAML 瀏覽器應用程式 (Xbap)，因為它們使用不同的啟動架構。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.SplashScreen"></xref> class with the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.SplashScreen"></xref>類別指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceName` parameter follows the usual rules for embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: `resourceName`參數會遵循一般規則進行內嵌的資源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>類別。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: The `resourceName` parameter specifies the name of the resource file, and not a URI.
trans-unit.target: `resourceName`參數會指定資源檔，並不是 URI 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.SplashScreen"></xref> class with the specified resource assembly.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.SplashScreen"></xref>與指定的資源組件的類別。

trans-unit.source: The `resourceAssembly` and `resourceName` parameters follow the usual rules for embedded resources.
trans-unit.target: `resourceAssembly`和`resourceName`參數，請遵循 「 內嵌資源的一般規則。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>類別。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: The `resourceName` parameter specifies the name of the resource file, and not a URI.
trans-unit.target: `resourceName`參數會指定資源檔，並不是 URI 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains the embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含內嵌的資源的組件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: Closes the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 關閉在啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: If you called the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A> method with the `autoClose` parameter set to `true`, you do not have to call the Close method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>方法`autoClose`參數設定為`true`，您不需要呼叫 Close 方法。</xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Show%2A>

trans-unit.source: The splash screen will close automatically after the application is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 啟動顯示畫面將會在載入應用程式後自動關閉。

trans-unit.source: When the splash screen closes, the length of time it will take for it to fade is determined by the default value for the `fadeoutDuration` parameter, which is 300 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 當啟動顯示畫面關閉時，它淡出花費的時間長度取決於的預設值為`fadeoutDuration`參數，也就是 300 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that specifies how long it will take for the splash screen to fade after the close operation has been initiated.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>指定花多少時間會淡出之後已起始關閉作業的啟動顯示畫面。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Displays the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 顯示啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: If you call the Show method with `autoClose` set to `true`, you do not have to call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫 Show 方法與`autoClose`設`true`，您不需要呼叫<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The splash screen will close automatically after the application is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 啟動顯示畫面將會在載入應用程式後自動關閉。

trans-unit.source: When the splash screen closes, the length of time it will take for it to fade is determined by the default value for the `fadeoutDuration` parameter, which is 300 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 當啟動顯示畫面關閉時，它淡出花費的時間長度取決於的預設值為`fadeoutDuration`參數，也就是 300 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: Call the Show method with `autoClose` set to `false` when you want to provide a non-default value for the fade duration.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以顯示方法`autoClose`設`false`當您想要提供淡出持續時間為非預設值。

trans-unit.source: You will have to call the <xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A> method to close the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>方法，關閉啟動顯示畫面。</xref:System.Windows.SplashScreen.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically close the splash screen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to close the splash screen manually.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要自動關閉啟動顯示畫面。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>手動關閉啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: The resource specified in the constructor could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到建構函式中指定的資源。

trans-unit.source: Displays the splash screen.
trans-unit.target: 顯示啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically close the splash screen; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to close the splash screen manually.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要自動關閉啟動顯示畫面。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>手動關閉啟動顯示畫面。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the splash screen window should use the WS_EX_TOPMOST style; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟動顯示畫面視窗應該使用 WS_EX_TOPMOST 樣式;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
